column19: Cannot map to both onsetDateTime and onsetString, so take onsetDateTime if available.

column9: If IAM-15 is not valued, not always 100% clear this is a practitioner, so much review locally.

column19: The values are added as additional .coding entries in the CodeableConcept for AllergyIntolerance.code
